items.sentence: Tom was startled awake by the air-raid siren.
Can you save enough money for a down payment?
You have a lot of money and I don't have any.
How many times a year do you go scuba diving?
We really should buy a new car, shouldn't we?
Tom grows potatoes and carrots in his garden.
My older sister's husband is older than I am.
I don't think Tom would be afraid to do that.
I don't think Tom will be tempted to do that.
I don't think Tom will be nervous doing that.
